official_title: A bill to amend the Depository Institutions Deregulation and Monetary Control Act of 1980.

summary.text: Amends the Depository Institutions Deregulation and Monetary Control Act of 1980 to extend the provisions of such Act concerning the interstate trust operations of bank holding companies.
